name: Structural Stress Authority Contract v389
intent: Deterministic structural stress proxy certification for TF, CS/PF, and vacuum vessel.

fields.description: TF inner-leg structural margin (allowable/applied) using sigma_vm_MPa and sigma_allow_MPa.
CS/PF structural margin using magnetic pressure thin-shell proxy.
Vacuum vessel external pressure stress margin using thin-shell proxy.
List of margin ledger entries with applied, allowable, margin, and dominant driver.

limits.margin_interpretation: margin >= 1 indicates allowable >= applied; optional minima enforce feasibility.
limits.validity: Screening-only; does not model buckling, fatigue, joints, or detailed geometry.
